resource_dependency.page_routes_mapping: { '/': BasePage, '/ranking': RankingPage, '/store': StorePage, '/train': TrainPage, '/workers': WorkersPage, '/upgrades': UpgradesPage, '/bank': BankPage, '/messages': MessagesPage, '/reports': ReportsPage }
resource_dependency.game_data_api: API endpoints under /api/pages/* returning dynamic data for each page

function: Provide multi-page navigation structure with routing between core gameplay sections
static_description: A fixed top navigation bar with links to Base, Ranking, Store, Train, Workers, Upgrades, Bank, Messages, and Reports pages. Each link styled with seashell background (#FFF5EE) and crimson content blocks (#DC143C). Active page highlighted visually.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any navigation item navigates the user to the corresponding page route while updating active state styling on the clicked element.

resource_dependency.race_attributes_schema: Database table 'races' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), strength_bonus (int), magic_bonus (int), speed_bonus (int), resource_production_modifier (float)
resource_dependency.player_race_assignment_api: POST /api/player/race endpoint to assign selected race to current player profile

function: Allow players to select one of four distinct races that influence gameplay attributes
static_description: A modal or dedicated section showing four race cards arranged horizontally. Each card displays the race name, an associated icon/image, and summary of unique attributes such as strength, magic, speed bonuses, and resource production modifiers. Background is seashell (#FFF5EE), cards have crimson borders (#DC143C).

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a race card sends a POST request to /api/player/race assigning the chosen race to the playerâ€™s profile and closes the selection interface.

resource_dependency.resource_tracking_api: GET /api/resources endpoint returning real-time quantities for each resource type
resource_dependency.resource_update_websocket: WebSocket connection to push live updates when resources change

function: Track and display real-time quantities of essential game resources
static_description: Fixed status bar at the top showing icons and numeric counts for Gold, Iron, Wood, and Wheat. Styled with seashell background (#FFF5EE) and crimson text/icons (#DC143C). Resource values are initially zero until loaded via API.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon loading any page, a GET request is made to /api/resources to populate initial resource counts.
Receives real-time updates through WebSocket and refreshes displayed resource numbers without full page reload.

resource_dependency.city_upgrades_schema: Database table 'city_upgrades' with fields: id (primary key), structure_name (string), level (int), cost_gold (int), cost_iron (int), cost_wood (int), cost_wheat (int), effect_description (text)

function: Enable players to enhance their city infrastructure through progressive upgrades
static_description: Grid layout presenting available structures for upgrade. Each tile shows structure name, current level, upgrade costs in resources, and a crimson-styled 'Upgrade' button. Background uses seashell theme (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Upgrade' button triggers POST request to /api/city/upgrade/{structure}, deducting required resources and increasing structure level upon success.

resource_dependency.workers_schema: Database table 'workers' with fields: id (primary key), type (string), assigned_to (string), level (int), experience (int), efficiency_bonus (float)

function: Manage assignment and leveling of workforce across different roles
static_description: Two-column view: left lists worker types with total count per type; right shows currently assigned workers grouped by role. Crimson-styled buttons for 'Assign Worker' and 'Upgrade'. Seashell background (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: 'Assign Worker' assigns idle worker to selected task; 'Upgrade' increases worker level using accumulated experience points via respective API calls.

resource_dependency.training_progression_schema: Database tables: 'soldiers' (id, class, level, health, attack_power, defense); 'training_queue' (soldier_id, start_time, completion_time)

function: Allow training and upgrading of military units with time-based progression
static_description: Vertical tabs for each soldier class. Tab content includes stats panel, training queue timer, and crimson 'Train Soldier' button. Background uses seashell color scheme (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Train Soldier' initiates training process tracked in queue; progress updated via polling GET requests to /api/train/status.

resource_dependency.rankings_schema: Database view aggregating player stats joined from users, cities, armies, achievements tables

function: Display competitive standings based on various performance metrics
static_description: Leaderboard table listing top players with rank number, username, score/value, and ranking category. Styled with alternating row colors, seashell background (#FFF5EE), crimson headers.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking column headers sorts leaderboard by selected metric using parameterized GET request to /api/ranking.

resource_dependency.store_inventory_schema: Database table 'store_items' with fields: id, name, description, price_type (enum: gold/resource), price_amount, effect_type, effect_value

function: Offer purchasable items and enhancements for player progression
static_description: Catalog grid displaying store items with name, description, price, and crimson 'Buy Now' button. Filter options above grid allow sorting by item type. Background set to seashell (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking 'Buy Now' sends POST request to /api/store/buy/{item_id} which validates funds and applies purchased effect immediately.

resource_dependency.bank_account_schema: Database table 'bank_accounts' with fields: player_id (foreign key), balance (decimal), last_interest_timestamp (datetime)

function: Provide secure storage and interest-based growth for accumulated resources
static_description: Dashboard showing current bank balance, recent transactions log, and forms for deposit/withdraw actions. Forms include input field and crimson submit button. Background styled with seashell (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting deposit or withdrawal form triggers corresponding POST request to update account balance and adjust inventory accordingly.

resource_dependency.message_threads_schema: Database tables: 'conversations' (id, participants), 'messages' (conversation_id, sender_id, content, timestamp)

function: Facilitate communication between players through private and group messaging
static_description: Split-pane layout: left sidebar lists conversation threads with preview snippets; main area shows message history with reply input box and crimson send button. All styled with seashell background (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting thread loads full conversation; typing and clicking 'Send' submits new message via POST /api/messages/send.

resource_dependency.reports_schema: Database table 'reports' with fields: id, category, title, content, timestamp, read_status (boolean)

function: Log significant in-game events and outcomes for review
static_description: List view with collapsible report entries showing category icon, title, date, and unread indicator. Expanding entry reveals full content. Crimson accent used for unread markers. Background uses seashell (#FFF5EE).

interaction_and_states.description: Expanding entry marks report as read; filtering by category fetches matching reports via GET /api/reports with query parameters.

resource_dependency.data_fetching_middleware: Axios/fetch wrapper ensuring all frontend data sourced from backend APIs

function: Ensure complete decoupling of frontend presentation from hardcoded data by sourcing everything from backend
static_description: Blank slate rendering until API responses populate UI components. Loading indicators shown during data fetch. No mock data present anywhere in codebase.

interaction_and_states.description: Each route triggers parallel API calls to retrieve relevant data before rendering component views.

resource_dependency.database_initialization_script: SQL script creating tables: users, races, resources, city_upgrades, workers, soldiers, training_queue, rankings_view, store_items, bank_accounts, conversations, messages, reports

function: Establish persistent relational storage layer using PostgreSQL with predefined credentials
static_description: Backend configuration file containing database connection string built from provided environment variables. Tables created on first run if not existing.

resource_dependency.css_framework_customizations: Global overrides applying seashell backgrounds and crimson accents to all UI elements

function: Apply consistent visual identity throughout application using specified color palette
static_description: Entire app wrapped in global styles setting background to seashell (#FFF5EE) and primary interactive/content areas to crimson (#DC143C).

resource_dependency.package_json_scripts: { "install:all": "npm install && cd backend && npm install", "dev": "concurrently \"npm run dev:fe\" \"npm run dev:be\"" }

function: Streamline local development workflow with unified installation and simultaneous frontend/backend execution
static_description: Root-level package.json configured with custom scripts enabling single-command setup and launch of entire stack.
